bio: MARY HIGGINS CLARK is the bestselling author of twelve novels and two collections of short stories. Beginning with the phenomenally successful *Where Are the Children?*, her books have sold more than thirty million copies in the United States alone. Born and raised in New York City, she has served as president of Mystery Writers of America. She makes her home in Saddle River, New Jersey, and in Dennis, Massachusetts.
name: Mary Higgins Clark
